en.title: Health Check Through Cat Stool: How to Identify Color, Shape, and Odor
en.content:
A cat's stool is an important indicator of their health. Make it a habit to observe during daily litter box cleaning.

Characteristics of Normal Stool

Ideally, stool should be brown to dark brown and firm enough that it slightly changes shape when pressed with a finger. It should be in moderately sized pieces and should not have a strong foul odor.

Stool That Requires Attention

ConditionPossible CauseAction
Persistent soft stoolFood change or stressStabilize diet; see a vet if no improvement
Watery stoolInfection or poisoningVisit the vet promptly
Bloody stoolGastrointestinal bleedingSee the vet immediately
Black stoolUpper GI tract bleedingSee the vet immediately
White specks in stoolParasites (tapeworm, etc.)Get deworming medication from the vet

Extra Caution for Kittens

Kittens have underdeveloped immune systems, and dehydration from diarrhea can progress rapidly. If soft stool persists, consult a veterinarian as soon as possible.

zh.title: 通过猫咪粪便进行健康检查：颜色、形状和气味的辨别方法
zh.content:
猫咪的粪便是了解健康状况的重要线索。请养成每天清理猫砂盆时观察的习惯。

正常粪便的特征

理想的粪便为棕色至深棕色，用手指按压时会稍微变形的硬度。大小适中呈条状，没有强烈的臭味。

需要注意的粪便

状态可能的原因应对措施
持续软便更换猫粮或压力稳定饮食，无改善则就医
水样便感染或中毒尽快就医
血便消化道出血立即就医
黑色粪便上消化道出血立即就医
混有白色颗粒寄生虫（绦虫等）到兽医处开驱虫药

幼猫尤其需要注意

幼猫免疫力尚未成熟，腹泻引起的脱水可能会迅速恶化。如果软便持续出现，请尽早咨询兽医。
